ModMetaData.name: KanbanStockpile
ModMetaData.author: ubergarm
ModMetaData.description:
Just like "pause when satisfied" but for hauling to stockpiles!
Reduces small hauling jobs to keep your colony running smoothly like industry using the kanban transport cards to signal hauling and production by only refilling stockpile stacks when below the specified percent threshold.
Built in Multiplayer Mod Support!
